Entries.default: From the upper ramparts, a wooden crane suspends a pallet stacked with heavy black casks over the cobblestone courtyard. The pallet groans, swaying slightly, while its hempen rope creaks from the strain.
[Throw a dagger to cut the cargo's rope.]
[Cast a spell to break the cargo's rope.]
[Leave.]
[Throw a dagger to cut the cargo's rope.]
[Cast a spell to break the cargo's rope.]
Stealthily, you aim a dagger at the cargo's rope. Following two warm-up flicks of your wrist, you toss the dagger with every last ounce of your strength.
Your throw is silent and dead-on. The dagger easily severs crane's the rope.
The throw is erratic from your haste to avoid detection. It misses the rope.
As the pallet plummets toward the ground, the loose cargo tumbles from all sides. The crates and barrels crack loudly on impact, splintering and spilling their goods against the rough cobblestone.

As the pallet plummets toward the ground, the loose cargo tumbles from all sides. 

Ancret has no time to react before the heavy load buries her beneath a pile of splintered wood and spilled wares.
Stealthily, [Specified 0] tosses a dagger at the cargo's rope.
[Specified 0]'s throw is silent and dead-on. The dagger easily severs crane's the rope.
[Specified 0]'s throw is both hasty and erratic, entirely missing the rope.
Scratching the underside of your jaw, you consider your options.
You are unable to cast any sort of magic that would be useful in this situation.
Brows raised, [Specified 0] looks to you for further direction.
[Specified 0] is unable to cast any sort of magic that would be useful in this situation.
[Cast Mind Blades.]
[Cast Burst of Summer Flame.]
[Cast Necrotic Lance.]
[Fire a burst of magic from your weapon.]
[Do something else.]
With a silent but hard swipe of your arm, you hurl a spell at the rope. It snaps with a twang, and the crane's cargo tips into an immediate freefall.
[Cast Mind Blades.]
[Cast Burst of Summer Flame.]
[Cast Necrotic Lance.]
[Fire a burst of magic from your weapon.]
[Do something else.]
With a silent but hard swipe of one arm, [Specified 0] hurls a spell at the rope. It hits. The rope snaps with a twang, and the crane's cargo tips into an immediate freefall.
[Shoot an arrow to sever the cargo's rope.]
[Shoot an arrow to sever the cargo's rope.]
To avoid notice, you aim and launch an arrow at your target in record time.
Zing! Your arrow slices cleanly through the cargo's rope, notching the stone wall behind it before everything clatters to the ground.

The arrow embeds itself into one of the casks on the pallet, dribbling a wine-red liquid quietly onto the cobblestones below.

Snake Eyes Condwen peers up at the dangling cargo briefly before sniffing and returning to his game.
